item.title: Our Donations
item.description: Here are a list of our donations in 2020 for Julie Eventually I’ll change this to be a proper page 2020-01-24 13:42:26 815 Charities Donation £600 Bank Transfer Susan Irwin “Fundraising work for Forever Young Club.” 2020-02-07 7:07:56 817 Charities Donation £200 Bank Transfer Joseph Walker Donation towards Raleigh International volunteering in Nepal. 2020-02-07 7:16:01 818 Charities Donation £875 Bank Transfer Balerno & District Schools Pipe Band Donation for 50% of cost to purchase second hand drums for the Balerno & District Schools Pipe Band.
